caption: Vases full of flowers are arranged in front of colored windows.
Inside a large room are green and cream sofas and a desk.
There is a room with green curtains on silk curtains and a table, chair and bed.
Old carpet shops are located around the market space with a pond in the center.
A traditional restaurant with many large beds.
A room with carpets and colored and patterned walls that has many doors.
A shopping center that has several pools and chairs on the lower floor.
Two girls in a gallery where the walls are full of paintings.
A woman with a black veil is standing next to two large copper dishes in a room with traditional architecture.
A few women are watching under the glass in a place with colored walls.
There is an escalator in the commercial complex.
It is a covered market where people come and go.
A religious and pilgrimage place decorated with mirrored walls and a large lantern.
A luxurious house covered with mirrored walls with chandeliers hanging from it.
It is a kitchen with white cabinets, a sink and a window.
A large theater with a high ceiling where the audience is watching the show.
